required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparative Pharmacodynamics and Pharmacokinetics Study of Generic and Reference Clopidogrel Products
clinical_study.official_title: Comparative Pharmacodynamics and Pharmacokinetics Study of Generic and Reference Clopidogrel Products in Thai Healthy Volunteers

oversight_info.authority: Thailand: Khon Kaen University Ethics Committee for Human Research

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the pharmacodynamic effect of clopidogrel on the platelet inhibition and the pharmacokinetic profiles of clopidogrel carboxylic acid metabolite between generic and reference clopidogrel products in Thai healthy volunteers

detailed_description.textblock: Platelet aggregation (ex vivo) were measured by using Whole blood impedence aggregometry (Chrono-log®) and VerifyNow® P2Y12 assay. Plasma concentration of clopidogrel carboxylic acid metabolite were measured by High performance liquid chromatography (HPLC).

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics/Dynamics Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject)

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamic effect: The platelet inhibition effect of clopidogrel at the various times on day 7 (0-24 hours) (at steady state)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood collection at 0 (before dosing), 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours after the last dose, administered at day 7

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic profiles: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve (AUC 0-24)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood collection at 0 (before dosing), 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours after the last dose, administered at day 7

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic profiles: The Maximum Plasma Concentration (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood collection at 0 (before dosing), 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours after the last dose, administered at day 7

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic profiles: Time to Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood collection at 0 (before dosing), 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours after the last dose, administered at day 7

intervention.description: Clopidogrel 75 mg once daily for 7 days Blood collection at 0 (before dosing), 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours after the last dose, administered at day 7
Clopidogrel 75 mg once daily for 7 days Blood collection at 0 (before dosing), 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24 hours after the last dose, administered at day 7

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age between 18 and 45 years
- Body mass index between 18-25 kg/m2
- No clinically significant abnormalities, as confirmed on medical history; detailed physical examination; clinical laboratory analysis (blood hematology, biochemistry, prothrombin time, bleeding time, and urinalysis)
Exclusion Criteria:
- An allergy to any drug; and/or a history of drug and/or alcohol abuse.
- Subjects who had donated blood within 3 months prior to the start of this study or had participated in another investigational drug study within 3 months prior to the start of this study
- Participating subjects were instructed to abstain from the use of any drugs for at least 2 weeks before and throughout the study.

facility.name: Faculty of Medicine, Khon Kaen University

responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor Dr. Wichittra Tassaneeyakul, Departments of Pharmacology, Faculty of Medicine
